content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Roma 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Roma 1.
Offside, Chelsea. Romelu Lukaku tries a through ball, but Demba Ba is caught offside.
Own Goal by Marquinho, Roma.  Chelsea 2, Roma 1.
Attempt missed. Romelu Lukaku (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Demba Ba.
Attempt blocked. Demba Ba (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Frank Lampard.
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Junior Tallo (Roma).
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Strootman (Roma).
Substitution, Roma. Junior Tallo replaces Francesco Totti.
Foul by Francesco Totti (Roma).

Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Strootman (Roma).
Attempt missed. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Frank Lampard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Romelu Lukaku replaces John Terry.
Substitution, Roma. Tin Jedvaj replaces Maicon.
Attempt missed. Marco Borriello (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Francesco Totti.

Attempt blocked. Medhi Benatia (Roma) header from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Federico Balzaretti with a cross.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Jamal Blackman.
Attempt saved. Pablo Daniel Osvaldo (Roma) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Francesco Totti with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Morgan De Sanctis.
Attempt saved. Ramires (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Roma 1. Frank Lampard (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Demba Ba.
Substitution, Chelsea. Eden Hazard replaces André Schürrle.
Substitution, Chelsea. Marco van Ginkel replaces John Obi Mikel.
Substitution, Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic replaces César Azpilicueta.

Demba Ba (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Medhi Benatia (Roma).
Attempt saved. John Terry (Chelsea) header from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by André Schürrle with a cross.
Hand ball by Erik Lamela (Roma).

Substitution, Chelsea. Oscar replaces Kevin De Bruyne.
First Half ends, Chelsea 0, Roma 1.
